current.c_content_1: I love the Scarflings scarves. I like how I feel when I wear one and I receive many compliments on how beautiful the scarves are. They can make the simplicity of what you wear look very special and you feel special.
current.c_content_2: This is very pretty and has neutral, cool tones which are easy to pair with my clothes, casual or dressy.
current.c_content_3: First time I wore it I got so many compliments.
current.c_content_4: It's a nice size and the colors are true to the picture. The shawl is a soft and airy silk that doesn't seem to snag on my clothing.
current.c_content_5: I rave about them to all my friends and family all the time!  And the Yellow striped silk chiffon is no exception.

settings.footer_about_us:
Scarflings brings you a diverse range of the most beautiful and highest quality scarves in the world. The ultimate accessory that can be worn in hundreds of different ways, from neck to head to belt to turban, even tied onto your favourite purse.

Choose from a range of different styles and prints to find the one that makes you feel elegant, sophisticated, and fabulous.

for all orders over $200.

30 days for a full refund.

and verified payment methods.

settings.qualifiedinfo: Congratulations, you have qualified for FREE shipping!

settings.text_box_top_title: Power dressing through a world of fashionable possibilities
settings.text_box_top_text:
A quality scarf can elevate your look and make you instantly feel lavish and sleek without needing to spend a fortune. A great scarf can also transform itself from an elegant neck accessory to a chic halter top, to a skirt, to a glamorous turban to a belt–and the list goes on! 

From the very beginning, our aim has been to create scarves of exceptional quality at a great price point. A wardrobe of scarves opens so many fashion possibilities and options; dressing up even the most minimal basics. Mastering how to wear a scarf is the ultimate in power-dressing. It conveys confidence, self-assuredness, and makes the wearer feel prepared for anything.

settings.text_box_left_text:
ScarflingsTM was established in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. While our hometown might not yet be well-known as an international fashion capital, we're looking to change that. Brimming with natural beauty and housing a burgeoning, multicultural metropolis, Vancouver is a high-tech, edgy, eco-friendly city.


Our promixity to the ocean and the mountains gives us a highly varied climate and that gives us scarf credibility. Scarves are a necessity in our famously cold Canadian winters a fashionable and functional wrap for spring and fall,and also beautiful during the fine temps in summer.


We know a thing or two about accessorizing and are excited to introduce our unique vision to the rest of the world. and breakthrough as a fresh sartorial choice for discerning fashionistas.
settings.text_below_image: The brilliant seasons in Vancouver cant help but inspire us. You ll see it in our creations.

settings.text_box_left_text:
Wardrobe efficiency is a hallmark of the ScarflingsTM brand. We create collections that mix and match with your existing wardrobe so you can enjoy plenty of variety without having to go the fast fashion route or buy a new expensive designer outfit to get a new designer look.

Since our inception, we have remained conscious about the wastefulness of the fashion industry in general and have taken efforts to combat this in our own processes. We use compostable and recyclable materials where we can. As our product range grows, we are looking toward new technologies to develop better and more environmentally responsible products.

You want and deserve the best quality scarves and wraps- garments that express your individual flair. We're committed to being your expert, one-stop-shop delivering quality, allure, and style directly to your door.

Season after season Scarflings promises to deliver outstanding pieces that provide the perfect finishing touch and give you the confidence to stylishly power through all of life's adventures.
settings.text_quote: "A scarf has to be the most beautiful thing ever invented to wear!"

settings.text_box_left_title: Maximize your minimalist wardrobe with a multitude of scarves!
settings.text_box_left_text:
Modern dressing is about a few great quality pieces. The upside of this pared-down wardrobe is simplicity. The downside is the risk of getting bored with the same look. The ScarflingsTM collection will power your wardrobe with endless possibilities. You can build on your wardrobe with the vast array of choices; after all, more scarves mean more opportunities to express yourself!

ScarflingsTM offers a beautiful range of luxurious scarves, wraps, and shawls for the modern woman. With attention to the finest details, our garments are meticulously conceived and crafted to reflect contemporary tastes and sensibilities.

As you walk through life playing many different roles, ScarflingsTM will make sure you are always dressed the part.

settings.box_paragraph: Modern dressing is about a few great quality pieces. The upside of this pared-down wardrobe is simplicity. The downside is the risk of getting bored with the same look.
ScarflingsTM offers a beautiful range of luxurious scarves, wraps, and shawls for the modern woman.
As you walk through life playing many different roles, ScarflingsTM will make sure you re always dressed the part.
With attention to the finest details, our garments are meticulously conceived and crafted to reflect contemporary tastes and sensibilities.
The ScarflingsTM collection will power your wardrobe with endless possibilities.
You can build on your wardrobe with the vast array of choices; after all, more scarves mean more fashion ... and more fun!

settings.text_box_left_title: Want to change up your look but don't know where to start?
settings.text_box_left_text:
The ScarflingsTM Style Experts can help you find just the right pieces to add to your wardrobe. Through a personalized, one-on-one consultation, you'll be able to receive advice on everything ranging from current trends to classic staples-depending on what your personal style goals are.

What can we do for you? Our stylists can help you choose the perfect wrap to compliment your special occasion outfit or curate a complete scarf wardrobe based on what you already have. Begin your style journey with the help of an expert eye.

settings.box_title: What can we do for you?
settings.box_description: Our stylists can help you choose the perfect wrap to compliment your special occasion outfit or curate a complete scarf wardrobe based on what you already have. Begin your style journey with the help of an expert eye.

settings.user_bio_txt:
I believe the way you dress has an overall effect on the day you 
end up having. I love being a personal stylist because helping others tune into themselves and create and express their own unique beauty, brings me so much joy. I believe confidence is built 
from within yet the exquisite fabrics and colors Scarflings brings 
to the world are the perfect outer expression of a beautiful inner 
world. I look forward to getting to know you and assisting you on 
your unique expression journey.

Starting her journey in the fashion industry in 2013, Alex has worked with various fashion magazines, high-end brands and luxury retailers over the years. Her expertise is defined by her passion for fashion and experience working alongside the industry's biggest names and events, and she strives to inspire people by embracing their personality through clothing. With the Scarflings Personal Stylist Service, Alex is looking to help women define their style and find the perfect match they will cherish and wear confidently.

Houra has been a stylist and personal shopper for the last 6 years. Living in different countries, all the way from Persia to Europe and finally Canada has built a deep appreciation of different cultures in her, inspiring her sense of fashion by blending patterns, colors and styles. All this, combined with her love for people enables her to bring out the glow in each individual.

Rojan has her own line of handcrafted shoes and bags. In addition to her creations, she has also been styling professionally for the past 3 years. She has styled editorials in magazines and worked with many celebrities as their stylist and personal shopper.

settings.box_description: Our stylists are here to consult with you so that you can make the most of your Scarflings purchase. They have a wealth of experience and come from a wide range of fashion backgrounds so you can be sure to connect with someone who understands your individual style.

What can we do for you? Our stylists can help you choose the perfect wrap to compliment your special occasion outfit or curate a complete scarf wardrobe based on what you already have. Begin your style journey with the help of an expert eye.

settings.block_txt: Surprise your dearest family members and friends with an accessory that boldly embraces their personal style. Crafted from a blend of wool and silk with inspiring prints designed to keep the most important women in your life stylish, the 'Classic Treats' shawls and wraps hold endless versatility atan unbeatable price point.

The stars that shine the brightest in our collection, these lavish accessories stand out with their luxe composition and intricate detailing. Needless to say, they are simply the perfect gift ideas if you are seeking to go big this holiday season, set to become an adored staple in any women's wardrobe
For those who enjoy shopping and curating their own collection just as much as the beauty of accessories, give a special Scarflings Gift Card for an unforgettable shopping spree.

settings.product_desc: Ranging from elegant twilly scarves to dazzling scarf rings, an array of little treasures ensure your stockings will be cherished by your loved ones, making the day even more special. With over 40 accessories in our Stocking Stuffers collection, you can easily add a thoughtful finishing touch to the presents hung by the chimney or placed under the tree.

settings.subscription_text_box_left_title: Receive handpicked designs every month, tailored to your personal style.
settings.subscription_description:
Welcome to the ScarflingsTM Subscription Box , a personalized service dedicated to suit your wardrobe perfectly. Every box you'll receive hides a scarf selected for you by our styling experts, centered around celebrating your aesthetic and providing you with accessories you'll never want to take off.

Whether you’d like to treat yourself to a luxurious monthly surprise or give a loved one the gift of a unique, personalized style service, the Scarflings Subscription Box will bring a dash of sleekness to your life. Instead of having to search for hours to find a style match made in heaven, our monthly Scarflings Box will deliver your new favorites straight to your doorstep.

settings.plan_heading: Are you Timelessly Minimal, a Modern Style-Seeker, or a Bold Trendsetter?
settings.plan_text: Thank you for taking the quiz and joining our subscription service. Let's get started!

settings.left_text: Welcome to Scarflings™ and thank you so much for stopping by our virtual boutique!

settings.about_founder: I'm Melissa, founder of Scarflings™ and fellow fashion-enthusiast. Here at Scarflings™, we like to think of ourselves as your personal accessory stylists for everything wraps, shawls, scarves, and more. Our mission is simple – to be your trusted style source and offer accessories that will bring a new sense of confidence and versatility to your wardrobe.

settings.round_right_text:
Scarflings™ was born from my own long-time love for scarves. As a little girl trying on my mother's colorful collection of scarves, I understood the transformative power that these accessories hold.

The creative uses for a deceptively simple swath of fabric still feel like magic, and to this day, they play a very important role in my closet. here

settings.about_title: "A scarf has to be the most beautiful thing ever invented to wear!"
settings.about_text:
I believe that scarves are must-haves in every woman's life. Shape-shifting in mood based on their shades and patterns, wraps and shawls are endlessly versatile accessories that will instantly embrace your personal style.

From busy days that center around business meetings to those "once in a lifetime" events, scarves simply fit any occasion. So, feel free to have a look around our shop, and let us know if we can help you with anything! We think you'll love what you see.

settings.round_left_heading: Looking for even more style inspiration?
settings.round_left_text: Do you have any questions about our designs or looking to learn more about the endless ways to style a scarf? Get in touch with one of our team members any time or chat to one of our style experts to take your outfits to a whole new level!

settings.cta_text: While you are deciding which new scarf to add to your collection, make sure to follow us to get some style inspiration for your next purchase!

settings.thank_video_heading: Your new accessory will be on its way soon!
settings.thank_video_text: Thank you for your order! Whether you chose one of our designs as an addition to your accessory collection or found the perfect gift for a loved one, we hope the scarf will exceed all expectations.

settings.text1: ✓ Insured and Expedited Shipping within 2 to 5 business days.
settings.text2: ✓ We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, or Paypal.

settings.text1: Avoid contact with rain, water and other chemicals, and entrust it to a professional dry cleaner when needed.
settings.text2: Preserve the beauty of your silk & wool products by storing them flat and untied.
settings.text3: Scarflings' products are made with carefully selected materials. Please handle with care for longer product life .

settings.about_round_left_heading: Still unsure which scarf to choose?
settings.about_round_left_text:
If you would like to take your accessory collection to the next level with a personalized service, our experts are here to help and create your very own Scarflings wardrobe.

With our range of styling services, you can learn more about your aesthetic and find your next favorite piece, all while mastering the endless ways of wearing your scarves.

settings.mob_section_title: Maximize your minimalist wardrobe with a multitude of scarves!
settings.mob_section_description:
Modern dressing is about a few great quality pieces. The upside of this pared-down wardrobe is simplicity. The downside is the risk of getting bored with the same look. The ScarflingsTM collection will power your wardrobe with endless possibilities. You can build on your wardrobe with the vast array of choices; after all, more scarves mean more opportunities to express yourself!

ScarflingsTM offers a beautiful range of luxurious scarves, wraps, and shawls for the modern woman. With attention to the finest details, our garments are meticulously conceived and crafted to reflect contemporary tastes and sensibilities.

As you walk through life playing many different roles, ScarflingsTM will make sure you are always dressed the part.

settings.cta_text: While you are waiting for your new favorite accessory to arrive at your door, make sure to follow us on social media & get some style inspiration for your next purchase!

settings.left_heading: Looking to level-up your scarf game but don't know where to start?
settings.left_text: Here are three types of scarves that will get you started toward a more fashionable wardrobe.

settings.text: We all hear about the seemingly magical powers that come from wearing a scarf- the versatility, practicality, and elegance. Given that you can own plenty of them and they don't take up a huge amount of space in your closet, scarves are considered to be the hero of today's minimalist wardrobe trend. But for those who are new to scarves, it can be daunting to know where to even start. With the large selection of beautiful pieces, it can be hard to choose. So, we've put together a primer on three fail-safe scarf options that you will undoubtedly reach for again and again. With these choices, you'll be sure to have a solid foundation for style success.
settings.mob_text:
We all hear about the seemingly magical powers that come from wearing a scarf- the versatility, practicality, and elegance. Given that you can own plenty of them and they don't take up a huge amount of space in your closet, scarves are considered to be the hero of today's minimalist wardrobe trend.

But for those who are new to scarves, it can be daunting to know where to even start. With the large selection of beautiful pieces, it can be hard to choose. So, we've put together a primer on three fail-safe scarf options that you will undoubtedly reach for again and again. With these choices, you'll be sure to have a solid foundation for style success.

settings.post_round_left_text: To be clear, when we talk about a 'neutral' scarf we don't mean plain or boring. It simply refers to a color palette that goes with virtually anything. It can range from black, white, cream, brown, grey, beige, charcoal... you get the idea. By this definition you will notice that animal print is considered a neutral - and there's nothing boring about leopard-print! While you could choose a single block of color, surprisingly, it can be much simpler (and smarter) to put together an outfit with a scarf that contains a multitude of neutral hues. One word on color selection: to decide whether you should stick to a neutral warm color palette or a cool color palette look to your other accessories. If you wear more gold-tone accessories then you may prefer a warm-hued scarf, while an abundance of silver in your closet might mean you feel more comfortable with a cool palette.

The reason that an embellished scarf is so great is that it adds texture and interest to your look. Popular scarf embellishments include tassels, pom poms, and fringe. These little points of difference, depending on the fabrication can be whimsical or lend a richness to the garment. Let your own personal style dictate which look works best for you. Perhaps you like the earthy feel of embroidered flowers or maybe crystal embellishments are just right for your daring aesthetic- the possibilities are endless.

Named after the type of wool that these scarves are traditionally made from, the pashmina is an elegant and versatile option that belongs in any closet. This scarf looks great dressed up or dressed down. It can be draped over the shoulders when paired with an evening dress and strategically bundled around the neck to keep you warm during the coldest of winters. They come in different weights, but a lightweight wool pashmina is an excellent year-round choice.

settings.home_banner_heading:
Walk with the Waves
Fly with the Winds.
settings.home_banner_description:
Wear scarves that will
saddle your Heart to Bliss!

settings.standard_feature_text1: One dedicated video call focusing on your personal style
settings.standard_feature_text3: Quick and efficient style advice by our style expert
settings.vip_feature_text1: Two dedicated video calls focusing on your personal style
settings.vip_feature_text3: Detailed style journey from picking the perfect scarf to styling it

settings.standard_step_para:
After completing the sign-up process, it’s time we get to know your aesthetic with the help of our initial questions.

During the call, our stylist will advise you on any style-related questions you may have. This session is completely tailored to you, so please don’t hesitate to ask any style-related questions.

For a special treat at the end of the consultation, you can use your $20 gift card to purchase your new favourite through our store.
settings.vip_step_para:
After completing the sign-up process and filling in the introductory questionnaire, we are all ready for the session!

During the introductory call, our stylist will learn even more about your personal style. At the end, our stylist will recommend a selection of scarves - and once you’ve found the one, all you have to do is use your special code.

After your scarf gets delivered to your door, our stylist will have a follow up chat with you. As this call is centered around your confidence and making the most of the scarf, feel free to get interactive!

settings.step_para: From working on editorials to styling high-end clients, our stylists have years of experience and a true passion for fashion. Learn more about them and pick the style expert you’d like to chat with:

You are almost all set!
To confirm your upcoming standard VIP styling session, please choose a suitable time slot for the meeting:

settings.text_box_left_text: Please note that we aim to respond to emails in 1-2 business days, however due to high the volume of emails we may take a little longer. Don't worry though, our support team will handle all emails in the priority that they are received and we will ensure your needs are looked after.

settings.subscription_text_box_left_des: Get a step closer to embracing your aesthetic & unlocking a range of sleek designs handpicked for you!

settings.subscription_m_text_box_left_des: Get a step closer to embracing your aesthetic & unlocking a range of sleek designs handpicked for you!

settings.post_text_box_left_title: 4 Reasons The Scarflings Box Will Transform Your Wardrobe
settings.post_text_box_left_des: Meet the ScarflingsTM subscription box: We are incredibly excited to introduce our subscription box, the newest addition to Scarflings that combines functionality with a luxurious personal shopper experience. Taking you on a 12-month long fashion journey, this service is all about shining a spotlight on your style and fashion favorites. How do we ensure the subscription box is just as fun and enjoyable as it is sleek?

settings.post_sub_heading1: 1. A stylish reminder of your personality & aesthetic
settings.post_left_text1: The Scarflings Subscription Box hides all those treasures that you have on your fashion wishlist and pick out for yourself while shopping. Before anything else, this lavish self-treat is a reflection of your aesthetic and your wardrobe - and to deliver a love at first sight" moment every month, the service looks to your must-haves and fashion preferences as the defining base.
settings.post_left_text2: Our subscription box adapts to your personal style while introducing new flares and details to your closet. Thanks to the complete personalization, the scarves chosen for you find the perfect balance between what you'll adore from the first second and what you'll be excited to experiment with. While the service doesn't shift you away from your go-to essentials, it does showcase a fresh twist on your favorites, inviting you to uncover new layers of your style.
settings.post_left_text3: Busy days can easily blend into busy weeks and months, and when time flies by incredibly quickly, we often don't get the chance to embrace seemingly small, but important details. One little detail that can get lost during eclectic times is your personal style_and trust us when we say that your aesthetic deserves the attention, even if you just never have the time. To offer a new level of practicality, the box carefully plans out your style journey, without you ever having to worry about it Rather than picking and choosing, trying on and standing in line, the box will simplify your shopping experience with one beautifully packaged accessory every month
settings.post_sub_heading4: 4. An overall celebration of fashion, picked by experts
settings.post_left_text4:
Beyond catering to your personal style, the box also embodies everything we love about the industry: its boldness, its endless creativity and its strive to constantly push boundaries With this mindset, our stylists will put together your personalized box every month while keeping in mind the timeless, current and upcoming fashion trends. 
Are you ready to take on this fashion journey? Fill out our questionnaire or get in touch with our expert at info@scarflings.com to find your match made in heaven!
settings.contact_text: Are you ready to take on this fashion journey? Fill out our questionnaire or get in touch with our expert at info@scarflings.com to find your match made in heaven!

Taking you on a 12-month long fashion journey, this service is all about shining a spotlight on your style and fashion favorites. How do we ensure the subscription box is just as fun and enjoyable as it is sleek?

settings.banner_heading: Enjoy Free Shipping Worldwide for orders over $200

settings.acc_question: How long will it take to ship my order?
settings.acc_answer:
All orders are processed in our fulfillment center overseas between 2 - 4 days. Deliveries take between 3-5 business days and in some rare cases 7 business days.

US orders usually take between 3-5 business days to be delivered from the date they are shipped. Worldwide orders takes 7- 10 business days and in rare cases can take up to 15 business days. Please note in some countries, customs may cause an additional delay in delivery.

For our Accessories, it requires up to 25 days to be delivered since it was located at different distribution center. We recommend that you keep an eye on your tracking. If you have more than one style of product, it's very likely you will receive them separately. Each item might have its own shipping code.

settings.acc_question: Which countries do we ship to?
settings.acc_answer:
Scarflings is happy to offer Worldwide shipping, with the exception of the following:
- United States Minor Outlying Islands
- APO, FPO, and DPO Address

Due to service limitations, we may not be able to deliver to outlying regions (e.g. Howland Island, Baker Island, Jarvis Island, etc.)

For addresses in more remote locations, please contact support@scarflings.com before placing an order.

If you paid for Expedited Shipping then that means our team will place your order as high-priority. It only takes 1-2 business days in order for us to process your order including shipping. You’ll also get your tracking number as soon as it gets shipped using FedEx International Priority Shipping.

settings.acc_question: Does Scarfling ship to PO Box addresses?
settings.acc_answer: Unfortunately, shipping to PO Box Addresses is unavailable at this time. To ensure that you’ll get your order, we need your home address.

settings.acc_question: Are there any documents needed during the delivery?
settings.acc_answer:
Are there any documents needed during the delivery?

To our valued customers located in the USA, nothing else is needed other than your presence as the courier needs your signature upon the arrival of your parcel.

If you happen to be busy, you may arrange the delivery with the courier. Please call FedEx customer service at 1-800-463-3339. They may also drop your parcel at the FedEx facility nearby in your location.

For Brazil

Please provide us your CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas or Natural Persons Register) in order for your parcel to clear its way to customs to the destination country. Send us an email to supports@scarflings.com

For India
It is required to cooperate with your local customs to arrange customs clearance and other paperwork. Please bring a valid ID and your tax identification number.

settings.acc_question: When will I receive my tracking number?
settings.acc_answer:
You will receive your tracking number within 5 business days of your order being fulfilled (shipped).

If you do not receive your tracking number, please contact us at support@scarflings.com.

Our warehouses are located internationally therefore shipments are bound to specific rules and regulations that govern the importing of goods.

For instance, the tax & duty threshold is the amount at which a person begins paying taxes based on the declared value of an item. If your purchases reach that threshold, the courier service will bill you for the duty they paid on your behalf and require payment on delivery.

settings.courier_note: We highly recommend monitoring the tracking information of your order on a daily basis. In case, shipping takes longer than expected, it’s best to contact our couriers.

settings.ref_question: Items must be returned within 30 days of receipt.
settings.ref_answer:
If you are returning an item you must inform us within 7 days upon receipt of the package.

Items must be unworn and unwashed.

Items must be returned in original packaging.

If 30 days have gone by since your delivery, unfortunately, we are unable to offer you a refund.

To complete your return, we require a receipt for the item you sent back as well as an email stating the reason for the refund request and return.

If you are returning an item, please send the us the tracking number for our reference. No refund or replacement will be issued without providing your tracking number.

Once your returned item is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment. Please allow for up to 14 days for your refund to be applied once we have confirmed you are eligible for a refund.

A restocking fee of 15% will be deducted from the original purchase price, applied to products purchased directly from Scarflings and that are returned within the 30-day return policy.

If you haven't received a refund yet, first check your bank account again. Contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next, contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you've done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at support@scarflings.com
Only regular priced items may be refunded, unfortunately, sale items cannot be refunded.

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. Please take note of all sizing charts before selecting size and color options. We do not exchange for wrong sizes. If damaged or defective, please send us an email at support@scarflings.com

You will be responsible for paying for shipping costs for returning your product. Shipping costs are non-refundable.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you, may vary.

If you are shipping an item(s) over $75, we recommend using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. Scarflings takes no responsibility for any item that is lost and not received due to postal issues regarding returns.

settings.refund_note:
Please Do Not Send Your Purchase Back To The Manufacturer.

We have a separate warehousing address that customer service will provide for you.

Please be aware once your item is shipped we cannot cancel it.

You need to wait until you receive the item and then if you want, you will have to send it back for a refund.
settings.refund_head: To Be Eligible For a Refund

settings.ret_left_text:
In order to guarantee our customers an amazing shopping experience, all items are individually inspected by our Quality Control Team before shipment.

If for some reason, you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return your item for a REFUND within 30 days however you must inform us within 7 days upon receipt of the package.

Please contact us before sending the item back to us for a refund. We do not accept returned items that were sent back by you directly without checking with us first.

settings.ret_answer:
Need to make a return? Submit your return request to our return center.

Make sure to describe the issue in detail, including the return reason. For defective, incorrect or not as described items, please send us a clear picture or video of the problem. Please keep the picture below 10 MB.

All returned items must be unworn, unwashed, and returned in their original condition.

Shipping and handling charges are non-refundable when returned for a refund/exchange.

Scarflings do not provide any pre-paid return labels. You are responsible for return postage costs.

Scarflings is not responsible for incorrect sizing or color selection.

A restocking fee of 15% will be deducted from the original purchase price, applied to products purchased directly from Scarflings and that are returned within the 30-day return policy.

Please submit your request to our return center. Your returns is subject for approval.

Ship back your order directly to the address provided.

Please DO NOT return your item to any other addresses of Scarflings, as the published addresses online and the shipping address on the package you received ARE NOT our returns address.

Please allow 14 business days for your return to be processed. Once your return is processed, you will receive an email confirmation.

settings.in_banner_heading: We're looking for 1-5 influencers to work with Scarflings on a 2021 campaign
settings.in_text_box_left_text: Looking to partner with a fast-growing luxury brand? We’re currently looking for stylish, fun-loving, creative influencers to help us build our community.

settings.in_sec2_text:
Naturally, you have a ton of amazing ideas about how to style our scarves. And if you can answer yes to the following questions, we’d love to hear from you:

  • Do you have a public profile? (We can’t work with private accounts)
  • Is your bio complete and up to date?
  • Do you have 10,000 or more followers?
  • Have you built your audience organically, without purchasing followers? (Warning: we’ll be checking!)

settings.in_sec3_text:
When you join the Scarflings™ influencer program, we’ll ask you to create fun and engaging content to introduce our brand to your followers. Here’s what you’ll get in return from your first campaign with us:

  • A scarf of your choice (up to $150 each in value)
  • We’ll send you a custom link so that your followers can enjoy a $15 discount on our website. You’ll receive $10 for every sale.
  • If we follow up with a second campaign, we can discuss payment

settings.in_sec4_heading: Step 4. How We Work with Our Influencers
settings.in_sec4_text: We ask all of our influencers to create a standard set of posts and assets, including unboxing videos, product imagery, hashtags, written reviews, and, of course, images of you wearing our scarves. We ask that you make your posts shoppable (it really works!) and that you send us the images to use in our own marketing material (because we want to promote you, too).
settings.in_sec4_bot_text: We choose our influencers for their authentic voices and creative vision. So we love seeing how you take these requirements and turn them into something fresh and exciting every time. We can’t wait to see what you come up with!

settings.in_banner_heading_mob: We are looking for 1-5 influencers to work with Scarflings on a 2021 campaign.
settings.in_text_box_left_text_mob: Looking to partner with a fast-growing luxury brand? We’re currently looking for stylish, fun-loving, creative influencers to help us build our community.

settings.step2_name: Choose which category of scarf suits you best?

settings.offer_des:
• Shipped with our amazing luxury silver subscription box.
  • Personalized service dedicated to suit your wardrobe perfectly.
  • While your subscription is live, you have an automatic discount of $20 when you buy something from us.

• Shipped with our amazing luxury silver subscription box.
  • 4x Bonus accessories/year: Scarf rings, twillys  ($400+) .
  • 2x Per Year: Receive great recommendations and advice from our style experts ($300).
  • Have an automatic discount of $30 when you buy something from us.
  • Luxury Subscription Box members enjoy exclusive privileges - like first to access our limited edition luxury scarves.

settings.accordian_title: When do I need to order to receive my first subscription box?
settings.accrdian_text: To make sure you are not missing out on next month’s box, please sign up to our service by the 1st of the previous month (so for example, if you are looking to get your hands on our June box, please finalize your subscription by the 1st May.)

settings.accordian_title: I need help deciding which box to sign up to, who can I contact?
settings.accrdian_text: If you are unsure which of our three aesthetics match your personal style the most, you can ask for expert advice by filling out our Subscription Questionnaire.

settings.accordian_title: Do I need to pay for shipping?
settings.accrdian_text: Shipping fees are all included in our subscription service – so you can enjoy your new scarves getting delivered to your door every month, completely free!

settings.accordian_title: How will I receive my scarves?
settings.accrdian_text: All our scarves are packaged in a luxurious gift box to make your surprise even more special.

settings.accordian_title: Can you tell me a bit more about the designs I’ll receive?
settings.accrdian_text: When creating our subscription box, we focused on creating a truly magical experience to all our customers. To keep the service just as convenient and practical as it is stylish, we’ve included a mix of wool and silk shawls in every subscription (this way, you can wear the designs all year round!)

settings.accordian_title: I’d like to cancel my subscription, how can unsubscribe from your service?
settings.accrdian_text: You can easily cancel your subscription without having to pay any fees and you can follow the steps to unsubscribe.

settings.accordian_title: I couldn’t find the answer to my question, how can I contact you?
settings.accrdian_text: I couldn’t find the answer to my question, how can I contact you? For other enquiries, please head to our Contact us page. We try our best to reply to every question within 1-2 business days, but please note that throughout busy time periods, we may take a little longer.

settings.client_review: "I rave about them to all my friends and family all the time!"
It's a nice size and the colors are true to the picture. The shawl is a soft and airy silk that doesn't seem to snag on my clothing.

I love the Scarflings scarves. I like how I feel when I wear one and I receive many compliments on how beautiful the scarves are. They can make the simplicity of what you wear look very special and you feel special.
This is very pretty and has neutral, cool tones which are easy to pair with my clothes, casual or dressy.
First time I wore it I got so many complements.

I love the Scarflings scarves. I like how I feel when I wear one and I receive many compliments on how beautiful the scarves are. They can make the simplicity of what you wear look very special and you feel special.

settings.heading: PARISIAN ELEGANCE
settings.desc: From the runways to the most-followed Instagram feeds, hints of Parisian chicness have been seen everywhere leading up to the new year, so we're expecting French sophistication to lead 2021's style reports. What does Parisian elegance mean exactly? For us, it's a perfect blend of refined shades and vintage-inspired, delicate patterns printed on either lightweight silk or lavish wool.
settings.pro1_text: a pleated midi dress and block heels
settings.pro2_text: an all-white shift dress and leather tote bag
settings.pro3_text: a ruched blouse and fitted jeans

settings.heading: Moody Prints
settings.desc: If you are looking for something a bit more daring, you're set to fall in love with this dark, mysterious edit on our stylish scarves in 2021 list! Rather than opting for classic patterns, these moody designs will instantly draw attention to your look with their dark shade palettes and contrasting prints. The best part? Thanks to their deep base colour, you can easily style these scarves with anything!
settings.pro2_text: a checkered sweater and fitted jeans
settings.pro4_text: a little black dress and patent pumps

settings.heading: SHEER SECOND SKIN
settings.desc: Combined with neutral tones, this trend encapsulates a new level of chicness. Instead of commanding attention with vivid colours, these sleek, semi-sheer layers elevate looks by playing with texture and illusion. Thanks to their featherweight material, our sheer chiffon and silk pieces are also amazing for layering all year round, so they're just as perfect for sunny garden parties as they are for chilly winter days.
settings.pro1_text: a black, fitted T-shirt and high-waisted jeans
settings.pro2_text: a minimal shift dress and an embellished bag
settings.pro3_text: a ribbed mini dress and a leather jacket

settings.heading: Aquamarine Allure
settings.desc: After seeing it on so many runways for the new year, no wonder this magical shade made it to our most stylish scarves in the 2021 list! A symbol of clarity, serenity and tranquillity, aquamarine is known to have an uplifting effect on your mood, whilst staying flattering on every skin tone. Our favourites from the season include a mix of understated and truly bold designs in both silk, chiffon and wool composition...which one will you fall in love within 2021?
settings.pro1_text: a chiffon mini dress and sandals
settings.pro2_text: a silk turtleneck and fitted pants
settings.pro3_text: a ribbed mini dress and a leather jacket

settings.heading: PATCHWORK PARADISE
settings.desc: This mix'n'match trend is set to make you smile! Rooted in a love for eclectic vintage prints, the patchwork details of these scarves were designed to instantly draw all eyes towards your outfit. Whether you are looking for something slightly more subtle with pastel shades or you're ready to go all out with highly contrasting colours and patterns, our patchwork paradise will not disappoint. Not sure how to style them? Keep the rest of the look minimal with timeless silhouettes and minimal details.
settings.pro2_text: a turtleneck dress and knee-high boots
settings.pro3_text: a balloon-sleeved romper and ankle boots
settings.pro4_text: a satin slip dress and cat-eye sunglasses

settings.heading: MONOCHROME MAGIC
settings.desc: Charming minimalism has dominated the runways for the last few years, and it is definitely here to stay as one of the most stylish scarf trends in 2021. From its endless versatility to its timeless sleekness, every element of a monochrome scarf offers easy styling, blended with an understated dash of glamour. So, it’s time to wrap your favourite houndstooth of checkered design around your shoulders and conquer 2021!
settings.pro1_text: a lace blouse and cropped jeans
settings.pro3_text: a menswear shirt with high-waisted pants
settings.pro4_text: a polo shirt with a high-waisted skirt

settings.heading: Invest and Grow!
settings.desc:
Scarflings™ offers a beautiful range of luxurious scarves, wraps, and shawls for the modern woman. With attention to the finest details, our garments are meticulously conceived and crafted to reflect contemporary tastes and sensibilities.

Learn about our success: fundable.com/scarflings

settings.in_text_box_left_text_mob: Looking to partner with a fast-growing luxury brand? We're currently looking for stylish, fun-loving, creative influencers to help us build our community.

settings.sec_heading: How We Work With Our Influencers
settings.in_sec2_text:
Naturally, you have a ton of amazing ideas about how to style our scarves. And if you can answer yes to the following questions, we'd love to hear from you:

  • Do you have 50,000 or more followers?
  • Have you built your audience organically, without purchasing followers? (Warning: we'll be checking!)

settings.in_sec3_text:
When you join the ScarflingsrM influencer program, we'll ask you to create fun and engaging content to introduce our brand to your followers. Here's what you'll get in return from your first campaign with us:

  • A scarf of your choice (up to $150 each in value.)
  • We'll send you a custom link so that your followers can enjoy a $15 discount on our website. You'll receive $10 for every sale.
  • The influencer with leading sales, will receive the opportunity to design their own scarf collection with us and with our lead designer!

settings.in_sec4_text:
You create your Instagram content and start posting it on that account. You will also send your content to us so we can also promote the campaigns. (If you need any assistance, we're here to help). The types of content we need will include (but not limited to) the following:
  • Unboxing Videos.
  • Product Imagery.
  • Hashtags.
  • Written or video reviews.
  • Images of you wearing our scarves.

settings.in_sec5_text: Help us find other influencers to join the program and earn commissions on the Subscription Box sales that you, and whoever you help sign up, make. Each SIP milestone you achieve, will earn perks for you and your audience, such as more FREE scarves, that you can use to promote the Scarflings Subscription Box and FREE vacations for your next trip!

settings.feat_text: One million dollars can mean many things. It could mean getting a larger space, better equipment, a more sophisticated crew, more power to perform better, or more time to spend with family and friends -and fans. With $1,000,000 you can travel anywhere in the world while still doing what you love.

When it comes to making money from your followers through promotional content, you must have had your fair share of challenges:
  • You get angry followers who feel coerced and duped by disguised promotional content
  • You lose some loyal customers who feel you're selling them instead of treating them.
  • Your sponsor wants you to do what they want and control every aspect of the campaign.
  • You create lifeless content that lacks your personal signature and driving inspiration.
  • You read through guidelines that take forever to understand.
  • You're offer short-term collaborations and one-off campaigns.

As a Scarflings Influencer, you will have none of these related challenges. If you want a brand that will get personal with you and be relevant to add value to your brand, and even more cash in your pocket, then you have come to the right partnership.

At Scarflings, we love to build personal relationships with influencers like you whose audience and values align with ours. We respect you as an influencer because following your passion is a risky endeavor, and we know what it takes to build an audience mostly from scratch and with nothing.

settings.feat_head: We Focus On Relationships. Not Metrics
settings.feat_text: At Scarflings, we look beyond the number of your retweets and likes that you get and focus on the relationship-building process. We are more interested in your quality than your popularity, in your value than in your volume.

Working with Scarflings will give you all the freedom you need to work at your own pace, in your own style, and in your own way. Our job is to look out for ways to help you make more money without compromising the quality of your brand before your own audience.

settings.cta_text:
We choose our influencers for their authentic voices and creative vision. So we love seeing how you take these requirements and turn them into something fresh and exciting every time.

We can't wait to see what you come up with!

settings.range_sec_text: Every Scarflings Influencer Point (SIP) you get brings you closer to getting $1,000,000.
settings.range_box_text1: To get one Scarflings Influencer Point (SIP), you need to get 100 Subscription Boxes from your followers. You will qualify for perks like additional scarves, which you will use to promote the Scarflings Subscription Box and get you one step closer to the $1,000,000 USD prize, with additional SIP’s you gain.
settings.range_box_text2: When you get 100 Subscription Box Sales from your audience via your posts and promotions, you will get 1 Scarflings Influencer Point. You can withdraw your SIP commissions after 30 days ($5000 USD). Plus you will start receiving a monthly Standard Subscription Box of your choice.
settings.range_box_text3: 5 Scarflings Influencer points will qualify you for our boosted ad campaigns on Facebook & Google to over 500,000 fashion and beauty lovers. You also earn a 7-Day FREE accommodation to one of our partner resorts/rentals. You can withdraw your SIP commission after 30 days ($20,000 USD). Plus you will start receiving a monthly Luxury Subscription Box of your choice.
settings.range_box_text4: 10 Scarflings Influencer points will qualify you for our boosted ad campaigns on Facebook & Google to over 1,000,000 fashion and beauty lovers. You also earn a 14-Day FREE accommodation to one of our partner resorts/rentals. You can withdraw your SIP commission after 30 days ($25,000 USD). Plus we will work with you to offer a giveaway for 20 scarves of your choice to your audience.
settings.range_box_text5: 50 Scarflings Influencer points will qualify you for our boosted ad campaigns on Facebook & Google to over 2,000,000 fashion and beauty lovers. You will get to design your own Scarflings Luxury Collection of 3 scarves, using our top illustrators, funded by us, and you’ll get a bigger commission. You can withdraw your SIP commission after 30 days ($200,000 USD).
settings.range_box_text6: The first influencer to reach our set milestone of 200 Scarflings Influencer Points (20,000 subscriptions) will become the winner of the Scarflings Unscripted Influencer program, and the winner gets a cash reward of $1,000,000 USD.
